comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: The praya (Des Voeux Road), looking west. Where the street makes a bend (near the 2 storeyed building on the left) should be the junction with Ice House Street. Near the centre of the photo should be Peddar Street. The 6 storey HK Hotel is not yet built. The Central reclamation (out to Connaught Road) in the 1890's also not yet seen.
